1456028796910452736.text: @chris_trag @StripeDev Thank you for joining me! I love the "old dog" vibe that exists between us when it comes to evangelism and advocacy. Always game to swap stores and look forward to coming down to Austin sometime!

1455995290893225986.text: @DoerrfeldBill @getpostman Understood. Definitely part of the discussion moving forward. I so get it. Spent years in your shoes railing against the motivations behind content in the space -- event built tooling to address. Then gave up. :-) Keep railing my friend. https://t.co/ISgbavdwEb

1455306386326179842.text: I invented a new word today -- untigration. You know like API untigration, the act of removing the integrations that exist between our systems.
